sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { showContactSuccessToast } from '../utils/toastManager'; import { playClickSound } from '../utils/soundManager'; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', category: '', message: '', urgent: false }); const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false); const [submitted, setSubmitted] = useState(false); const contactCategories = [ 'Technical Support', 'FIR Related Query', 'Case Status Inquiry', 'Legal Assistance', 'Feedback/Suggestion', 'Complaint', 'Other' ]; const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target; // For phone number, only allow digits if (name === 'phone') { const numericValue = value.replace(/\D/g, ''); // Remove all non-digit characters if (numericValue.length <= 10) { // Limit to 10 digits setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: numericValue })); } return; } setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value })); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsSubmitting(true); playClickSound(); // Simulate API call setTimeout(() => { const refNumber = `REF${Date.now()}`; showContactSuccessToast(refNumber); setSubmitted(true); setIsSubmitting(false); }, 2000); }; if (submitted) { return (

Message Sent Successfully!

Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

Reference Number: REF{Date.now()}

); } return (
{/* Header */}

Contact Us

We're here to help you 24/7

{/* Contact Information */}
{/* Emergency Contacts */}

Emergency Contacts

Police Emergency
100
Women Helpline
1091
{/* Support Contacts */}

Support Contacts

24/7 Helpline
1800-XXX-XXXX
Available 24 hours a day
Email Support
support@justicechain.gov.in
Response within 24 hours
Head Office
Justice Chain Headquarters
New Delhi, India - 110001
{/* Office Hours */}

Office Hours

Monday - Friday 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM
Saturday 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM
Sunday Emergency Only
Emergency Support 24/7 Available
{/* Contact Form */}

Send us a Message

Response Time

We typically respond within 24 hours. For urgent matters, please call our helpline at 1800-XXX-XXXX.

{/* Additional Information */}

For Immediate Assistance

If you're experiencing an emergency or need immediate police assistance, please don't use this form. Call the emergency numbers directly.

100 - Police Emergency
1091 - Women Helpline
1098 - Child Helpline

Feedback & Suggestions

We value your feedback and are constantly working to improve our services. Your suggestions help us serve you better.

Service Improvements
New Feature Requests
User Experience Feedback
); }; export default Contact;
